summary: A couple is drawn into a game show with a whooping winning prize. However the game turns into more than a survival for them with no escape.
cast: Paresh Rawal|Rajeev Khandelwal|Tina Desai|Dhruv Ganesh|Asheesh Kapur|Hanif Hilal|Gulam Gouse Deewani|Ankit|Sumit Rana|Inderjeet Singh Sagoo|Niketa Agarwal|Monica|James|Sangesh|Mani Nakayan|Yohana Mansub|Joe|Nishant|Letty|Nathaniel Kissun|Sevuloni Vasu Vatubua|Abraham Collin Danfore|Alexandera Tuiverata|Simon Prez|Sanjay Roy
title: Table No.21
